name: 59th Street Bridge
description:
Drive the taxi car to run away from the city, beware of obstacles and mines!

Controls = 

  • Arrow Up
  • Arrow Down

This  game has been released for the 32nd Gamecodeur GameJam, under the theme 'Escape from New York'.

We decided to base the gameplay on the runaway scene at the end of the movie.

We used JavaScript/Html5 for the game development.

Code and graphics:  HalfSquid

https://half-squid.itch.io/

Music, audio design and integration: Yoann Claude

https://yoannclaude.itch.io/

Made with FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.
